definition: a blow with the fist, in boxing, to strike hard, especially with the fist
details:
noun
- a blow with the fist, in boxing
= example: a blow with the fist, in boxing
- a short nail with a flat head
= synonyms: clout nail
- special advantage or influence
= synonyms: pull
- a target used in archery
verb
- to strike hard, especially with the fist
= example: to strike hard, especially with the fist
